resources.string:
1. First pick a shape of interest

 2. Press corresponding shape on quilt

 3. Pick next shape

 4. Repeat until done :)

1. Press the "Find network button."

 A search for the network SmartQuilt shall begin 

 2. A message will pop up on success and 

 you will now be connected to the Quilt.
Steps to connecting to your Quilt.
Connection Failed, Please try again or check if the network "SmartQuilt" \n\n appears on your list of available wifi connections.
Wifi is off, please turn your wifi on then try again.
Data has been retrieved from the SmartQuilt.
All the tips and tricks to help you need to help your baby learn through play!
National Curriculum Framework for children from birth to four developed by the Department of Basic Education
Oklahoma\'s Learning Guidelines for infants, toddlers and twos
Resources provided by the United Nations International Children\'s Emergency Fund
